Class SubscriptionServiceMockImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hybris.cis.api.subscription.mock.impl.SubscriptionServiceMockImpl

    CisService, SubscriptionService

    public class SubscriptionServiceMockImpl
extends Object
implements SubscriptionService
